p: On the fourteenth day of December A. D. 1876 personally appearant Martin Lawson, John Seroin, Christ Anderson, Thomas Henword, Elias Krebs, Edward Haguer, John Nickels, Peter Nelson and Victor Martinson, who each and all of them made oath to me that they all are the plaintiffs named in the foregoing complaint that they here each heard the said complaint and know the contents that are believe the same to be true. Before me December 14th A. D. 1876 Beniah Brown Deputy Clerk 3rd Judicial District.
